0.text:
Innate: Kalista's  basic attack has unique properties:
Deals 90% AD physical damage.
Does not deal damage nor trigger  on-hit effects if Kalista loses  sight of the target before it hits.
Has an  uncancelable windup, though can be cancelled by using  Rend.
Kalista can switch targets during its windup.
Has its windup reduced by only 0.75% per  1% bonus attack speed.
Makes Kalista  dash in the target direction after issuing a movement command during its windup or right after casting  Pierce.
The distance increases based on the direction (in regards to her facing direction) she is dashing into, whether she has Tier 2 Boots and is entirely different from  Pierce.
Kalista will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

1.text: Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with an exclusive  Black Spear.

0.text: Active: Kalista hurls a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If Pierce kills the target, the spear continues onward to transfer all of the target's  Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.

0.text: Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her  Oathsworn are  tethered, their basic attacks and  Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.

1.text: If both Soul-Marks are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take bonus magic damage, capped against non-champions, and cannot be Soul-Marked again for a few seconds. Soul-Mark deals a minimum of 75 damage to  minions and executes them if they're below  125 health. Kalista applies the damage  on-attack while the Oathsworn does so  on-hit.

2.text: Passive: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.

3.text: Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel that moves forward in the target direction, granting  sight of the area along its path.

0.text: Passive: Kalista's basic attacks  on-hit and  Pierce lodge a spear into their target, applying a Rend stack for 4 seconds, which stacks up to 254 times. The duration refreshes on subsequent attacks and hits of  Pierce.

1.text: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from valid nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them physical damage and  slow them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic  monsters.

2.text: Rend resets its  cooldown and restores  mana if it kills at least one target.

3.text: A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability.

4.text: Rend can be used during the dash of  Martial Poise and the cast time of  Pierce. In-flight spears and  Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.

0.text: Active: Kalista invokes her  tether to retrieve her Oathsworn and hold them for 4 seconds, pulling them to her over 1 second and  cleansing them from all  crowd control, as well as rendering them  invulnerable and  untargetable for the duration.

1.text: Upon their arrival, the Oathsworn may  dash with  displacement immunity to a target location, and will automatically do so at maximum range from Kalista's facing direction, ending Fate's Call's effects in the process. The Oathsworn stops upon colliding with an enemy  champion, landing at their  basic attack range relative to the target hit, and will  knock up all nearby enemies upon impact for a few seconds.

2.text: The Oathsworn must be nearby to cast this ability. The Oathsworn  vanishes upon retrieval until reappearing from completing the dash, and is also  silenced and unable to perform movement or attack commands during the entire effect.

1.concerningText: Active: Kalista hurls a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.

2.concerningText: If both Soul-Marks are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take bonus magic damage, capped against non-champions, and cannot be Soul-Marked again for a few seconds. Soul-Mark deals a minimum of 75 damage to  minions and executes them if they're below  125 health. Kalista applies the damage  on-attack while the Oathsworn does so  on-hit.

3.concerningText: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from valid nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them physical damage and  slow them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic  monsters.

The Oathsworn stops upon colliding with an enemy  champion, landing at their  basic attack range relative to the target hit, and will  knock up all nearby enemies upon impact for a few seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+10% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 300 − 800 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage, and 50 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 300 − 800 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wind's Fury: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – WIND'S FURY: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by  critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  950

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wrath: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Unique – Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a 0.15 second delay.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WRATH: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  900

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
